title: image.Decode can't detect jpg or gif format
body:
by **tg8866**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.get whatever a jpg or gif image
2.use image.Decode to detect the image format
3.It always return: "image: unknown format"
4,when it's a png image, it just works ok.

What is the expected output?
"image: jpg" or "image: gif"

What do you see instead?
image: unknown format

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
windows and linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
$ 8g -V
8g version weekly.2011-09-21 9854

Please provide any additional information below.
Tested in windows7 and colinux with debian unstable
